Sentencas: Combined power generation systems with combinations of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and various enhanced gas turbine (GT) cycles were evaluated.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: In the GT part, steam injected gas turbine (STIG) cycle, GT/steam turbine (ST) combined cycle, and humid air turbine (HAT) cycle were considered.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: Moreover, additional recuperation was considered by means of air preheating (APH) in the STIG cycle.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: Effects of operating turbine inlet temperature (TIT) and pressure ratio (PR) on overall system performance were assessed.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: Although the SOFC-HAT system shows the lowest specific work output compared to other systems, its highest thermal efficiency presents a significant advantage.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: Furthermore, at high TITs and PRs the SOFC-HAT system gives the best performance in terms of both thermal efficiency and specific work.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles

Sentencas: Results indicate that energy recuperative features in the HAT promote the positive effect of increasing TIT by means of enhancing GT efficiency, leading to the improvement in thermal efficiency of the overall system.
Titulo: Combinations of solid oxide fuel cell and several enhanced gas turbine cycles
